name: Verdoso Investment
overview: Verdoso is a Paris based private investment holding founded in1997 and focused on middle market direct investments in various of industries including manufacturing, value-added distribution and business services. The group proactively seeks to make constructive investments in companies in transition or facing operational challenges and which can benefit from both Verdoso’s financial resources and entrepreneurial approach. His investment decision process relies on a business project built together with the management and based on performance enhancement. Verdoso typically seeks majority or significant minority positions and holds a legitimate key investor position together with the management. They provide their competencies and resources to help them implementing the company strategy and action plan.
